name: Small Bomb
description: A pinecone-sized metal ball filled with gunpowder. When lit, spend 1 AP to throw within 5 spaces of you. Any creature within 1 space of the space you chose must make a DC 13 Dexterity save or take 3 Piercing damage, half on a successful save.

name: Matchbox
description: A box of matches. 5 charges, expend a charge and 1 AP to light a match.
